subclusters.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
Genomic Instability and RecQ Helicase Deficiency Aging Theory
Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Mutation Rate Aging Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA repair mechanisms maintaining nuclear genomic stability as a determinant of longevity and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes PARP-1 mediated poly(ADP-ribosyl)ation in nuclear DNA repair correlating with species longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DNA damage accumulation impairing hematopoietic stem cell function via nuclear DNA repair defects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows that enhanced DNA repair reduces somatic nuclear DNA damage and extends lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links nuclear DNA damage accumulation to cellular senescence driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on transcriptional repression of nuclear DNA repair genes as a cause of cellular senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights superior nuclear DNA repair capacity as a longevity assurance system in long-lived species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes DNA damage accumulation and enhanced repair as drivers of aging and longevity across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on accumulation of oxidative nuclear DNA lesions and insufficient repair contributing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes genomic instability from nuclear DNA damage accumulation as a cause of aging in myocardium.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows Werner syndrome model where nuclear DNA repair defects cause systemic aging and mitochondrial dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Uses C. elegans to link nuclear DNA repair defects and genomic instability to aging and neurodegeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on impaired double-strand break repair in vascular cells causing DNA damage accumulation and vascular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes aprataxin deficiency causing accumulation of oxidative nuclear DNA breaks and premature senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear DNA Repair Deficiency and Longevity Assurance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details PARP-1 role in telomere stability and nuclear DNA repair affecting aging under oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genomic Instability and RecQ Helicase Deficiency Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on RecQ helicase mutations causing genomic instability and differential premature aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genomic Instability and RecQ Helicase Deficiency Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes RecQ helicase deficiency causing recombination errors, genomic instability, and premature aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Base Excision Repair Deficiency and Oxidative Damage Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on reduced BER capacity, especially DNA polymerase beta deficiency, leading to oxidative DNA damage accumulation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Mutation Rate Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes accumulation of mitochondrial DNA rearrangements with age impairing mitochondrial function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and Mutation Rate Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes selective pressure on mitochondrial mutation rates and mitochondrial protein evolution affecting longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and NAD+ Depletion in DNA Repair Deficiency Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links DNA repair defects to mitochondrial dysfunction via NAD+ depletion and impaired mitophagy in Cockayne syndrome.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and NAD+ Depletion in DNA Repair Deficiency Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on age-dependent decline in axonal transport of mitochondria causing mitochondrial dysfunction and neuronal aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and NAD+ Depletion in DNA Repair Deficiency Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links ER decline affecting mitochondrial maintenance and dynamics contributing to aging and Alzheimer's disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Evolutionary Decline of Natural Selection and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes aging as shaped by declining force of natural selection post-reproduction affecting immune defense and aging pace.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Evolutionary Decline of Natural Selection and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on defective induction of stress-induced premature senescence in fibroblasts leading to keloid formation, linked to aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Evolutionary Decline of Natural Selection and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes death spiral as a distinct late-life phase reflecting systemic physiological decline, related to evolutionary aging processes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Evolutionary Decline of Natural Selection and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links DNA damage and senescence rates to gestation period and lifespan across placental mammals, reflecting evolutionary aging modulation.
